author: Grant Peck / AP
title: Mike Pompeo Accuses China of Pushing Territorial Ambitions Amid Coronavirus Pandemic
description: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo told his Southeast Asian counterparts that China is pushing its territorial ambitions amid the virus pandemic
content:
(BANGKOK) — U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo told his Southeast Asian counterparts on Thursday that China is taking advantage of the world’s preoccupation with the coronavirus pandemic to push its territorial ambitions in the South China Sea.
Pompeo made … [+2615 chars]
